channel.title: Italics on Editing EPUBs for NNELS

item.title: Bold and italics
item.description: Strong vs. Bold. Emphasis vs. Italics. What’s the difference? And what should we do about it? In HTML5, there are two types of “bold” - represented by the <strong> and the <b> elements. There also two types of “italics” - represented by the <em> and the <i> elements. Each of these elements convey different information to the reading system. If you’re curious about their uses, you can explore the links in the References.
